summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a dinner invitation at the Gates dinner in Davos. The conversation touches on personal sentiments and future plans, indicating a friendly relationship between the two.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing personal matters and a dinner invitation.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, responding positively to Epstein's invitation and sharing personal thoughts.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are engaged in a friendly email exchange discussing personal interests and invitations.

keyFacts: The email discusses a dinner invitation at the Gates dinner in Davos.
Epstein expresses a desire to put a mooring in front of Staley's dock for his boat.
Staley mentions that 'Larry is sad', indicating a personal sentiment.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
There are multiple mentions of the email being confidential and intended for the addressee only.
